directions: Grill hot dogs until done. Prepare Idahoan Buttery Homestyle Mashed Potato Cup according to package directions and stir in stone ground mustard. Place not dog on bun and spread potato mixture on top. Add toppings to your taste. No ketchup needed!
ingredients: 1 Idahoan® Buttery Homestyle Mashed Potato Cup
title: Idahoan® Picnic Dog
